statements: SELECT * FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, time_spent FROM user_activity WHERE time_spent > 10;
SELECT user_id, platform_id FROM user_activity WHERE platform_id = 'abc123';
SELECT user_id, platform_id, time_spent FROM user_activity ORDER BY time_spent DESC;
SELECT MAX(time_spent) AS max_time_spent FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, time_spent FROM user_activity WHERE time_spent > 10 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, time_spent, platform_id FROM user_activity WHERE platform_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE time_spent BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND platform_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY user_id ASC, time_spent DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(time_spent) AS total_time_spent FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_time_spent > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT platform_id FROM user_activity WHERE time_spent >= 15 ORDER BY platform_id;
SELECT user_id, session_id, start_time, end_time FROM user_sessions;
SELECT session_id, user_id, start_time, end_time FROM user_sessions WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, session_id FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, average_time_minutes FROM user_average_time_spent WHERE average_time_minutes > 30;
SELECT * FROM user_average_time_spent;
SELECT user_id, start_time, end_time, session_id FROM user_sessions WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_time DESC
SELECT user_id, average_time_minutes FROM user_average_time_spent WHERE average_time_minutes > 30 ORDER BY average_time_minutes ASC
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE session_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678' AND start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT user_id, start_time, end_time FROM user_sessions WHERE session_id IS NOT NULL AND end_time IS NOT NULL ORDER BY start_time ASC
SELECT user_id, average_time_minutes FROM user_average_time_spent ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_id, username, registration_date FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT content_id, view_date FROM content_view WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM sessions WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_views, content_id FROM content_view GROUP BY content_id HAVING total_views > 10;
SELECT users.username, content_view.view_date FROM users INNER JOIN content_view ON users.user_id = content_view.user_id WHERE users.age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;

SELECT users.username, SUM(content_view.duration_minutes) AS total_duration FROM users LEFT JOIN content_view ON users.user_id = content_view.user_id GROUP BY users.username HAVING total_duration > 60;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT view_date) AS days_with_views FROM content_view GROUP BY user_id HAVING days_with_views >= 5 ORDER BY days_with_views DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, user_age FROM users WHERE user_age > 30;
SELECT user_id, user_age, user_gender FROM users WHERE user_gender = 'male';
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT action_type, action_duration FROM actions WHERE action_duration > 60 ORDER BY action_duration ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, user_gender FROM users WHERE user_gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_id, avg_time_spent FROM user_avg_time_spent ORDER BY avg_time_spent DESC;
SELECT sessions.session_id, actions.action_type, actions.action_duration FROM sessions JOIN actions ON sessions.session_id = actions.session_id;
SELECT user_id, username, user_age FROM users WHERE user_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY user_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, user_id FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE session_duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT activity_name, activity_duration_minutes FROM user_activities WHERE session_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, content_id, rating FROM user_content_ratings WHERE rating >= 4.5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT users.user_id, users.username, user_sessions.session_duration_minutes FROM users JOIN user_sessions ON users.user_id = user_sessions.user_id;

SELECT users.username, user_activities.activity_name, user_activities.activity_duration_minutes FROM users JOIN user_sessions ON users.user_id = user_sessions.user_id JOIN user_activities ON user_sessions.session_id = user_activities.session_id;
